page.title: 07MILTON ABBAS FIRST SCHOOL.
page.content: Milton Abbas Church of England Voluntary Controlled First School is an attractive Victorian flint and brick building surrounded by pleasant grounds. There are now 36 children on roll with an extra 7 children due to start school for the first time next Spring. There are two classes in the School, the Juniors with the Headteacher and the Infants with the second teacher. The children come from Milton Abbas and from nearby villages. Some children at the School previously attended Hilton School until its closure three years ago. A school bus brings children from Lower and Higher Ansty, Melcombe Bingham and Hilton. Children start at the School a little before their fifth birthdays and stay until they are nine years old.
